Base:InitialProperties.Base:InitialProperty: "react:descsub"
"react:read"
"run"
"if \$prop(this.trait:metal) = none then set this.trait:brief to metal else set this.trait:brief to \$prop(this.trait:metal)"
"if \$prop(this.trait:variant) \<\> nil then set this.trait:brief to \$prop(this.trait:brief) \$prop(this.trait:variant)"

"set this.trait:brief to \$prop(this.trait:brief) \$prop(this.trait:superbrief) :: set this.trait:look to \$sam(\) :: if \$prop(this.trait:design) = none then set this.trait:look to \$prop(this.trait:look). else set this.trait:look to \$prop(this.trait:look) of \$prop(this.trait:design) design."
"if \$prop(this.trait:metal) = none then set this.trait:examine to A metal else set this.trait:examine to \$sam(\)"
"if \$prop(this.trait:variant) \<\> nil then set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine) \$prop(this.trait:variant)"

"set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine) \$prop(this.trait:superbrief) :: if \$prop(this.trait:design) \<\> none then set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine) of \$prop(this.trait:design) design"
"if \$prop(this.trait:color) = none then set this.ztemp to a else set this.ztemp to \$sam(\)"

"set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine), about 39 inches in full length, with \$prop(this.ztemp) leather-wrapped grip, basket-hilt guard and :: if \$prop(this.trait:stone) = none then set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine) cats-head shaped pommel. This particular sword appears to be a hybrid of the longsword and the rapier, having a basket-hilt guard of a rapier as well as the long thick double-edged blade of a longsword. else set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine) \$sam(\) cats-head shaped pommel. This particular sword appears to be a hybrid of the longsword and the rapier, having a basket-hilt guard of a rapier as well as the long thick double-edged blade of a longsword."
"if \$prop(this.trait:symbol) \<\> none then set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine) The double-edged blade is engraved with \$sam(\) near the basket-hilt guard."
"if \$prop(this.trait:mastermark) \<\> nil then set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine) You note the professional mark of \$prop(this.trait:mastermark)."
"set this.xdesc to \$sam(\) :: set this.trait:brief:blade to \$prop(this.trait:superbrief) double-edged blade :: set this.trait:look:blade to A double-edged blade on \$prop(this.xdesc)."

"set this.trait:examine:blade to \$prop(this.trait:look:blade) It is approximately 33 inches in length, from the tip of the blade to the basket-hilt guard. :: if \$prop(this.trait:symbol) \<\> none then set this.trait:examine:blade to \$prop(this.trait:examine:blade) It is engraved with \$sam(\) near the basket-hilt guard."
"if \$prop(this.trait:mastermark) \<\> nil then set this.trait:examine:blade to \$prop(this.trait:examine:blade) You note the professional mark of \$prop(this.trait:mastermark)."

"set this.trait:brief:pommel to \$prop(this.trait:metal) \$prop(this.trait:superbrief) pommel :: if \$prop(this.trait:stone) = none then set this.trait:look:pommel to A else set this.trait:look:pommel to \$sam(\)"

"set this.trait:look:pommel to \$prop(this.trait:look:pommel) cats-head shaped pommel on \$prop(this.xdesc). :: if \$prop(this.trait:stone) = none then set this.trait:examine:pommel to \$prop(this.trait:look:pommel) else set this.trait:examine:pommel to A \$sam(\) pommel on \$prop(this.xdesc), fashioned into cats-head shape."
"set this.trait:brief:hilt to \$prop(this.trait:superbrief) hilt :: set this.trait:look:hilt to A hilt on \$prop(this.xdesc)."

"if \$prop(this.trait:color) = none then set this.trait:examine:hilt to A hilt on \$prop(this.xdesc), consisting of a leather-wrapped grip, a basket-hilt guard and a cats-head shaped pommel. else set this.trait:examine:hilt to A hilt on \$prop(this.xdesc), consisting of \$sam(\) leather-wrapped grip, a basket-hilt guard and a cats-head shaped pommel."
"if \$prop(this.trait:stone) \<\> none then set this.trait:examine:hilt to \$prop(this.trait:examine:hilt) The pommel is set with \$sam(\) fashioned into a cats-head shape."

"set this.trait:brief:guard to \$prop(this.trait:superbrief) guard :: set this.trait:look:guard to A basket-hilt guard on \$prop(this.xdesc). The basket-hilt covers most of the grip of the schiavona's hilt, providing additional protection to the hand and wrist of its wielder. :: set this.trait:examine:guard to A basket-hilt, mounted between the grip and double-edged blade of \$prop(this.xdesc). The basket-hilt covers most of the grip of the schiavona's hilt, providing additional protection to the hand and wrist of its wielder."

"set this.trait:brief:grip to \$prop(this.trait:superbrief) grip :: set this.trait:look:grip to A simple grip on \$prop(this.xdesc). :: if \$prop(this.trait:color) = none then set this.trait:examine:grip to A simple grip on \$prop(this.xdesc), wrapped with natural leather. else set this.trait:examine:grip to A simple grip on \$prop(this.xdesc), wrapped with \$prop(this.trait:color) dyed leather."

"if \$prop(this.trait:inscription) = nil then goto 0220 else if \$prop(this.trait:inscription) \<\> none then set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine) The inscription \\"\$prop(this.trait:inscription)\\" has been skillfully executed near the hilt."
"set this.ztemp to nil :: set this.xdesc to nil :: return"
"run"
"if \$prop(this.trait:inscription) = nil then exit true else if \$prop(this.trait:inscription) = none then exit true else if \$obj(actor) = \$obj(env.this) then goto 0030"
"emit.actor You must be holding \$brief(this) to do that. :: exit false"
"emit.actor The inscription \\"\$prop(this.trait:inscription)\\" is visible upon \$brief(this). :: exit false"

Core:Properties.Core:Property: "react:descsub"
"react:read"
"run"
"if \$prop(this.trait:metal) = none then set this.trait:brief to metal else set this.trait:brief to \$prop(this.trait:metal)"
"if \$prop(this.trait:variant) \<\> nil then set this.trait:brief to \$prop(this.trait:brief) \$prop(this.trait:variant)"

"if \$prop(this.trait:metal) = none then set this.trait:examine to A metal else set this.trait:examine to \$sam(\)"
"if \$prop(this.trait:variant) \<\> nil then set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine) \$prop(this.trait:variant)"

"set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine) \$prop(this.trait:superbrief) :: if \$prop(this.trait:design) \<\> none then set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine) of \$prop(this.trait:design) design"
"if \$prop(this.trait:color) = none then set this.ztemp to a else set this.ztemp to \$sam(\)"

"set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine), about 39 inches in full length, with \$prop(this.ztemp) leather-wrapped grip, basket-hilt guard and :: if \$prop(this.trait:stone) = none then set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine) cats-head shaped pommel. This particular sword appears to be a hybrid of the longsword and the rapier, having a basket-hilt guard of a rapier as well as the long thick double-edged blade of a longsword. else set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine) \$sam(\) cats-head shaped pommel. This particular sword appears to be a hybrid of the longsword and the rapier, having a basket-hilt guard of a rapier as well as the long thick double-edged blade of a longsword."
"if \$prop(this.trait:symbol) \<\> none then set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine) The double-edged blade is engraved with \$sam(\) near the basket-hilt guard."
"if \$prop(this.trait:mastermark) \<\> nil then set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine) You note the professional mark of \$prop(this.trait:mastermark)."
"set this.xdesc to \$sam(\) :: set this.trait:brief:blade to \$prop(this.trait:superbrief) double-edged blade :: set this.trait:look:blade to A double-edged blade on \$prop(this.xdesc)."

"set this.trait:examine:blade to \$prop(this.trait:look:blade) It is approximately 33 inches in length, from the tip of the blade to the basket-hilt guard. :: if \$prop(this.trait:symbol) \<\> none then set this.trait:examine:blade to \$prop(this.trait:examine:blade) It is engraved with \$sam(\) near the basket-hilt guard."
"if \$prop(this.trait:mastermark) \<\> nil then set this.trait:examine:blade to \$prop(this.trait:examine:blade) You note the professional mark of \$prop(this.trait:mastermark)."

"set this.trait:brief:pommel to \$prop(this.trait:metal) \$prop(this.trait:superbrief) pommel :: if \$prop(this.trait:stone) = none then set this.trait:look:pommel to A else set this.trait:look:pommel to \$sam(\)"

"set this.trait:look:pommel to \$prop(this.trait:look:pommel) cats-head shaped pommel on \$prop(this.xdesc). :: if \$prop(this.trait:stone) = none then set this.trait:examine:pommel to \$prop(this.trait:look:pommel) else set this.trait:examine:pommel to A \$sam(\) pommel on \$prop(this.xdesc), fashioned into cats-head shape."
"set this.trait:brief:hilt to \$prop(this.trait:superbrief) hilt :: set this.trait:look:hilt to A hilt on \$prop(this.xdesc)."

"if \$prop(this.trait:color) = none then set this.trait:examine:hilt to A hilt on \$prop(this.xdesc), consisting of a leather-wrapped grip, a basket-hilt guard and a cats-head shaped pommel. else set this.trait:examine:hilt to A hilt on \$prop(this.xdesc), consisting of \$sam(\) leather-wrapped grip, a basket-hilt guard and a cats-head shaped pommel."
"if \$prop(this.trait:stone) \<\> none then set this.trait:examine:hilt to \$prop(this.trait:examine:hilt) The pommel is set with \$sam(\) fashioned into a cats-head shape."

"set this.trait:brief:guard to \$prop(this.trait:superbrief) guard :: set this.trait:look:guard to A basket-hilt guard on \$prop(this.xdesc). The basket-hilt covers most of the grip of the schiavona's hilt, providing additional protection to the hand and wrist of its wielder. :: set this.trait:examine:guard to A basket-hilt, mounted between the grip and double-edged blade of \$prop(this.xdesc). The basket-hilt covers most of the grip of the schiavona's hilt, providing additional protection to the hand and wrist of its wielder."

"set this.trait:brief:grip to \$prop(this.trait:superbrief) grip :: set this.trait:look:grip to A simple grip on \$prop(this.xdesc). :: if \$prop(this.trait:color) = none then set this.trait:examine:grip to A simple grip on \$prop(this.xdesc), wrapped with natural leather. else set this.trait:examine:grip to A simple grip on \$prop(this.xdesc), wrapped with \$prop(this.trait:color) dyed leather."

"if \$prop(this.trait:inscription) = nil then goto 0220 else if \$prop(this.trait:inscription) \<\> none then set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine) The inscription \\"\$prop(this.trait:inscription)\\" has been skillfully executed near the hilt."
"set this.ztemp to nil :: set this.xdesc to nil :: return"
"run"
"if \$prop(this.trait:inscription) = nil then exit true else if \$prop(this.trait:inscription) = none then exit true else if \$obj(actor) = \$obj(env.this) then goto 0030"
"emit.actor You must be holding \$brief(this) to do that. :: exit false"
"emit.actor The inscription \\"\$prop(this.trait:inscription)\\" is visible upon \$brief(this). :: exit false"
